apps.name: MenuBro
apps.details: Browse the web directly from your macOS menu bar. Fast, efficient, and always accessible.

features.title: Multi-Tab Browsing
features.description: Open multiple websites simultaneously. Supports tab drag-and-drop sorting and pinning important tabs.

features.title: Multi-Screen Design
features.description: Specially designed for multi-screen setups. Specify which screen windows appear on for optimal workflow.

features.title: Device Emulation
features.description: Switch between different device types with appropriate user agents for desktop and mobile browsing.

features.title: Global Shortcuts
features.description: Access MenuBro quickly with customizable keyboard shortcuts for efficient browsing.

features.title: Responsive Interface
features.description: Clean, beautiful user interface that adapts to different content and supports light/dark modes.

features.title: Privacy Protection
features.description: Enable additional privacy features to protect your browsing data when you step away.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: MenuBro ("the App") respects and protects your privacy rights. This Privacy Policy explains in detail how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. We may collect the following types of information:

howWeUseInformation.title: 2. How We Use Information
howWeUseInformation.content: We may use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Nothing we collect, nothing we use

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information in the following circumstances:

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: The App may link to third-party websites or services, such as social media platforms, analytics tools, etc.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: Under applicable laws, you may have the following rights:

contactUs.title: 7. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions, comments, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the following methods:

changesToPrivacyPolicy.title: 8. Changes to Privacy Policy
changesToPrivacyPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated policy will be posted on this page with the update date. We recommend that you review this policy regularly to stay informed of any changes.
